ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Selo's Song of Travel
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Who s arguing?  We re discussing the fact that the people who are supposedly in-the-know don t know. He didn t make a mistake; he just didn t know. Yes he
ygData.messageBody:
>I'm done arguing this thread.

Who's arguing? We're discussing the fact that the people who are supposedly
in-the-know don't know.

He didn't make a mistake; he just didn't know. Yes he admitted it, yes
people overreact and flame him for the merest slip-up but by his own
admission he has very little idea about issues pertaining to Bards. This
doesn't do much to foster confidence in the people who play Bards and who
hope that our issues will be dealt with little more than a "Doh! Shows you
how much I know about bard songs :)"

>Like I said, if you can do the job better, go apply.

No thanks. I think he does a great job of addressing a myriad problems and
shrugging off more than his fair share of verbal abuse.

He just needs to work on his Bards a bit more. ;)

-KS
